name: XCTSkip
desc: An error that causes the current test to cease executing and the test runner to mark the test as skipped when the test throws the error.

items.name: init(String?, file: StaticString, line: UInt)
items.desc: Intitializes an error to skip a test.

items.name: let errorCode: Int
items.desc: The error code that represents a skipped test.

items.name: var errorUserInfo: [String : Any]
items.desc: The user info dictionary related to the skipped test.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String
items.desc: A localized version of the description of the skipped test.

items.name: var message: String?
items.desc: An optional description of the skipped test, displayed in the Test navigator.

items.name: static var errorDomain: String
items.desc: The default domain of the error.
